senses.sense_definition: Simple past and past participle of <w>monument</w>.

examples.text: The historic victory was <w>monumented</w> by the construction of a large arch in the city center.
They <w>monumented</w> the sacred site to ensure it would be respected by future generations.

senses.sense_definition: Marked by the positioning of a monument, often in the form of a small stone or concrete structure to define a boundary.

examples.text: The surveyor located the <w>monumented</w> corner of the property after clearing the brush.
We walked along the <w>monumented</w> boundary that separates the two large estates.
